p: In our study with 299 CSF samples (unpublished data), 3% of CSF samples from children with suspected meningoencephalitis were ZIKV positive by PCR. Although studies have primarily focused on congenital infections caused by ZIKV, acquired childhood infections should also be carefully monitored, as our data suggest that the virus is an important causative agent of meningoencephalitis in paediatric patients.
